name: Jailbird
description:
Jailbird is a school project created the game development course at NTNU

Story: You play as an infamous ex-cop who has been framed and put in prison with all the criminals he put behind bars. All prison facilities are run by AI, and suddenly the prison malfunctions, opening the cell doors, leaving you in a fight for your life agains the cold blooded criminals seeking revenge.

If there are any problems opening the game with mac, right click the game and press "open", this will open a dialog where you can choose to open the game
